thread.title: Donald Macintyre's Sketch: Guess what? The sports minister likes sport!
thread.title_full: Donald Macintyre's Sketch: Guess what? The sports minister likes sport! - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Donald Macintyre's Sketch: Guess what? The sports minister likes sport!
text: Welcome to the Tracey Crouch show. You name it, Tracey’s been there first. Today was Mike Dugher’s debut as the new shadow Culture Secretary. But his workmanlike question about the Government dropping a “central” Leveson recommendation for easier libel actions against newspapers was overshadowed by the sports minister. She had an engagingly personal answer to almost every question. As she herself said, after drawing appreciative grunts from the SNP by suggesting “some might argue that at least one of our home nations should still be in [the Rugby World Cup]”, " I know how to play the crowd. " Read more
